backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with comprehensive domain types for products, retailers, listings, orders, applications, and analytics.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration function for upgrading the canister state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence metadata linking features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for various frontend files to support build planning.
frontend/index.css: Sets up global Tailwind styles and theme color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the application with providers and renders the HashRouter and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Implements a searchable dropdown using popover and command components with selectable options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Displays a destructive alert indicating that admin features require backend implementation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Shows a loading overlay during identity login or actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog informing users that profile setup functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards content by checking admin status and showing an access-denied card if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAppr: Gates content behind approval checks, showing an approval request UI for nonâ€‘approved users while allowing admins through.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures a user is authenticated before rendering children, otherwise displays a login prompt.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component that swaps to themed fallback placeholders when the source fails to load.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: Global React error boundary that catches runtime and promise errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: Error screen showing details and providing reload and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/shop/cart/CartPr: Cart context managing items, persistence, totals, and quantity/stock validation.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Hook providing search, category filtering, sorting, and derived product lists for catalog items.
Footer displaying copyright info and a link attribution with dynamic year and hostname.
Shop header with navigation, branding, cart indicator, mobile menu, and admin link support.
Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and an auth initialization overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Provides a placeholder global catalog query that currently returns an empty list.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing CRUD operations with placeholder backend calls and cache invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Offers React Query hooks for order creation, retrieval, filtering, and status updates, all using placeholder backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Implements product-related React Query hooks for listing, CRUD operations, and cache updates using stubbed backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains hooks for approval and admin-related queries and mutations against the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetailers.ts: Provides retailer CRUD and listing hooks using React Query with unimplemented backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTowns.ts: Implements town listing and CRUD hooks using actor-backed backend calls with proper cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Defines hooks for profile retrieval, saving, and role-based user listing with placeholder backend logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes plus shared container styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDriversPag: Empty admin page placeholder for managing drivers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageList: Empty admin page placeholder for managing product listings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPickupPoin: Empty admin page placeholder for managing pickup points.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Empty admin page placeholder for managing retailers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminShoppersPa: Empty admin page placeholder for managing shoppers.
Implements full CRUD UI for towns with dialogs, filtering, and status management using custom hooks.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Displays admin stats and handles user approval actions with tables and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with quantity controls, price totals, and cart management actions.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CataloguePage.ts: Loads and filters the product catalogue with search, category filtering, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/shop/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including delivery, payment options, order creation, and success state.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Renders role-application info cards and alerts, with disabled apply buttons and a link to view application status.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Lists customer orders with loading and empty states, showing alerts until backend support exists.
Displays order details or loading/error states, with navigation back to the orders list.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Home page with hero section, feature cards, and optional CTA for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Shows application tracking placeholder with alert and link to apply.
frontend/src/router/HashRouter.tsx: Implements hash-based routing with auth/admin guards and maps routes to shop pages.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides formatting, parsing, and validation utilities for ZAR amounts.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Helpers for selecting primary/all product images, generating safe URLs, and checking image limits.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds deployment-safe URLs for public assets using Vite's BASE_URL.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports a list and type for South African provinces.
frontend/src/utils/themeAssets.ts: Centralizes theme asset URLs using publicAssetUrl for deployment safety.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats IC nanosecond timestamps into readable date and date-time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing) and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, with typography, container-query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests for an admin-managed marketplace app.
